modName: STAR WARS mod collection (Magicka Sabers in Hands)
summary: a STAR WARS mod collection with Magicka Sabers and Blasters in Hands of the NPCs in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]

[size=6][b][color=#000000][size=6]!!!START A NEW GAME FOR THIS MOD TO WORK!!![/size][/color][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]!!!START A NEW GAME FOR THIS MOD TO WORK!!![/size][/color][/b]
[b][color=#bf9000][size=6]!!!START A NEW GAME FOR THIS MOD TO WORK!!![/size][/color][/b]
[/size]

[size=5]OKAY to start it well and clean[/size]


1-download this Mod
Alternate Start/ Life another life
--------------------------------------------------------------
[b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?
---------------------------------------------------------------
[/b]
2-Start a new game/ life

3-take place in the imerial army
choose it at the statue of mara
(i love that mod)

4-so you can start beside imperator palpatine and darth vader without problems

5-enjoy your fight against the rebell scum

6-have a nice coke







Versions 2.0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tullius = Palpatine with red saber and shock-hand
vader as an officer in the backround 
blasters with 10 damage explosions and 10 shot semi automatic
tusken raider as the forsworn (audio tusken scream from the movie may work, not testet it yet)
some droids as bandits
bandits with blasters and their bosses with sabers
draugr all sabers
vampire all sabers
heroes alll sabers


note:there still some normal weapons in it , i work on it in the future


to do:

mandalorian thief guild
more star wars content in versions 3.0 




[u]Star Wars Mod collection V1.0[/u][/b][/center]



This is an collection of some Star Wars Mods included the Magicka Saber from Lord Haun and the Unique Magicka Saber from Opsguy.

It also change General tullius clothe in to the Darth Vader Armor, Tullius will be in his normal Suit in the beginning of skyrim but in his castle he becomes Vader.
the Imperial Soldier in to Stormtroopers
and the Army of Ulfrik in to the Rebell Assault. 

Bandits with Blaster and their Boses with different color of Sabers
Vampire with 1handed red sabers and their usual drain power in the other hand
stormtrooper with blasters 
rebell assault with blaster
the companions with unique sabers
[b]
Some heroes and villiants with saber 
[/b]
-tullius (darth vader)
-mercer frey
-ancanco
-cicero
-harkon
-delphine
-esbern
and some more...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FIRST INSTALL MAGICKA SABER AND UNIQUE MAGICKA SABER; THEN AFTER THAT MINE MOD; OVERWRITE IF ASKS!



Installation: Put the Esp and the Bsa files in your skyrim Data folder and enable it with an Mod Manager.
Deinstallation: delete these files
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comment: I realy dont like Jedi robes or sith clothe , i think vampire look sith like enough. so i wont put some in to this mod in the future.

maybe some mandalorian armor, we will see. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9421/?

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16069/?


[b]Double Jump[/b]

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65044/?
(It's SKSE plugin, no ESP. You can find a text file in "[b]Data/SKSE/Plugins/DoubleJumpPlugin.txt[/b]" there you can configure how many times you can jump and allother settings)
